attributes.action: Let Chester Zoo open and save it from Bankruptcy
attributes.additional_details: Chester Zoo is a world leader in conservation programme. It would be a absolute travesty if this Zoo was forced into bankruptsy by covid rules that mean it has to stay shut. They are in desperate need of finance and at a time when parks and beaches that cant be monitored for social distancing are allowed to open, there is no good reason to keep this Zoo with its massive open spaces and well thought out monitoring of social distance closed. Please allow it to open before its too late.
attributes.background: Grant permission to Chester Zoo to open so that it can continue to do its magnificent work in conservation while keeping the animals in beautiful habitats. Stop this Zoo from bankruptcy
